item.title: DOGE Announces $55 Billion in Savings
item.description: Almost a month into the Trump Administration, the Department of Government Efficiency has announced substantial savings in government spending.

item.title: 'Bulldog' James Uthmeier Sworn in as Florida AG
item.description: James Uthmeier, hailed by Gov. Ron DeSantis as a "bulldog," was sworn in as Florida's attorney general Monday, filling the role previously held by Sen...

item.title: Rep. Mark Harris to Newsmax: Confident GOP Can Pass Budget in Single Bill
item.description: Rep. Mark Harris, R-N.C., told Newsmax on Tuesday that he is confident the GOP can unite to pass a budget in a single bill.

item.title: MAGA Sheriff Announces Run for Calif. Governor
item.description: A pro-Trump sheriff became the first major Republican candidate to enter California's 2026 gubernatorial race.
